overview:
Steffi Czerny has been working for Hubert Burda Media for more than 10 years. She is a curious person and loves to actively connect ideas, people and businesses, most importantly in the fields of media, internet and arts. She loves to discuss; “the next big thing”, “media in transition” and “diversity 2.0” are her favourite conversational topics.

She is currently Managing Director at Hubert Burda Media R&D, Marketing & Communications, an assignment she shares with Dr. Marcel Reichart as well as being co-founder and co-host of DLD.

In 2007, she founded two successful crossmedia communities for Hubert Burda Media: burdastyle.com and hallohund.de.

For several years now she has tried to learn the fine art of juggling, especially between family and job, and if you don’t find her hacking her Blackberry, she hides as a fervent birdwatcher in Bavarian Alps.
